title: Product Designer
content:
Flourish was founded in 2017 with the goal of helping financial advisors to better secure the financial futures of their clients. We focus on independent Registered Investment Advisers (RIAs), delivering financial products that advisors can’t easily access today through beautiful, scalable, and easy-to-use technology.
Today, we work with over 700 RIAs that collectively represent more than $1.5T in assets under management across two products: Flourish Cash, a cash management solution with more than $4B in deposits, and Flourish Crypto, a turnkey cryptocurrency offering built for financial advisors and their clients. Headquartered in New York City, we are an independent subsidiary of MassMutual Life Insurance Company1.
Read on if you are interested in joining a small, highly collaborative, rapidly growing startup—backed by the support and stability of a Fortune 500 company.



About You
You are a creative designer with a track record of delivering at all stages, from initial concepting all the way through to the final product. You have strong problem solving abilities and thrive in both self-directed efforts and as part of a collaborative team. You look for opportunities where design can be used to improve any aspect of an experience. You are an exceptional communicator, capable of explaining your design decisions, and are comfortable sharing your work early and often to collect feedback. You are eager to work with a fast paced and growing team. You believe in getting the details right and care deeply about your work.
About the Role
As a Product Designer at Flourish, you will contribute to ambitious goals across both product and marketing workstreams. Working closely with our design director, product managers, engineers, other designers, and the marketing team, you will design and iterate on everything from elegant end-to-end user experiences to marketing campaigns. This is an opportunity to use design to create impact across the company. This is an opportunity to use design to create impact across the company, our product, and with our end clients and customers.
Principal Responsibilities

Collaborate with product, engineering, marketing, and other designers to deliver creative solutions to a wide variety of design challenges
Create and present low- to high- fidelity outputs (sketches, wireframes, mockups, and prototypes)
Work within and contribute to our design system to promote a cohesive design language across products
Advocate for user needs, good design, and accessibility
Assist in user research and translate findings into design recommendations
Track and understand current and upcoming design and UX trends, and recommend if and when it makes sense for Flourish to move toward them or even away from them
Design assets for marketing use including emails, social, web pages, print, campaigns, and in-house initiatives as needed

Qualifications

Bachelor’s or higher education degree in Graphic Design, UX, HCI, or related field, or equivalent working experience
3-5 years of experience designing consumer-facing software products
A portfolio of visual and product design work
Proficient in Figma and Adobe Creative Suite
Experience designing marketing materials including infographics, fact sheets, advertisements, or other similar collateral in print and digital formats
Have a deeply collaborative and iterative design process that includes giving, accepting, and acting on feedback
Good communication skills with the willingness and ability to explain thinking behind your designs decisions
Ability to work both independently and as part of a fast moving team
Comfortable with change and able to adapt to shifting priorities

Preferred Candidates Will Also Have

Strong background in visual design
Experience designing consumer-facing products in highly regulated industries (e.g. finance, medicine, pharma)
Experience in Mobile app design and development
Demonstrated interest in Finance, FinTech, or related fields
Experience working with and contributing to a design system
Basic understanding of  HTML/CSS

At Flourish, we focus on ensuring fair, equitable pay by providing competitive salaries, along with bonus and incentive opportunities and benefits for all employees.
Base Salary Range: $90,900 - $141,300 plus bonusDisclosures:
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability or protected veteran status.
1 The Flourish business is owned by Massachusetts Mutual Life Insurance Company ("MassMutual"). Flourish Financial LLC and Flourish Digital Assets LLC are indirect, wholly-owned subsidiaries of MassMutual.
